title: The Grand Duke
tags: how to unlock the grand duke
content: rd. Counsellor Florrick asked us to locate and rescue him - but we refused. Drow abducted Grand Duke Ravengard from Waukeen's Rest. We agreed to help Counsellor Florrick find and rescue him from his captors. She believes they travelled westward from the inn. Drow abducted Grand Duke Ravengard from Waukeen's Rest. We agreed to help Counsellor Florrick find and rescue him from his captors. She believes they travelled westward from the inn - possibly to the fortress called Moonrise Towers. The cult
